title: Define project requirements and specifications
description: Document the functional and non-functional requirements for the SimuladorPlanificacionUrbana.

title: Design urban simulation model architecture
description: Develop the overall design and structure of the urban simulation model.

title: Develop frontend for user interaction
description: Create a user-friendly interface for users to interact with the urban simulation model.

title: Develop backend services for data processing
description: Implement necessary backend services to process and manage the urban simulation data.

title: Implement database for data storage
description: Set up a suitable database to store the urban simulation data.

title: Integrate frontend with backend services
description: Connect the frontend and backend components to facilitate data flow.
dependencies: Develop backend services for data processing

title: Perform quality assurance testing
description: Test the system to ensure it functions correctly and meets requirements.

title: Review and refine the urban simulation model design
description: Assess the urban simulation model design for potential improvements.

title: Document project features and usage
description: Write clear documentation for users to understand the features and usage of SimuladorPlanificacionUrbana.
